meanings.definition: A fight between dogs, typically organized for entertainment or gambling purposes.
meanings.sent1: Dogfighting can be cruel and illegal.
meanings.sent2: Some people enjoy watching dogfighting events.
meanings.sent3: The neighborhood kids pretended to have a dogfighting competition with their toy dogs.
meanings.sent4: The two stray dogs engaged in a fierce dogfighting match over a bone.
meanings.sent5: The news report exposed the underground world of dogfighting rings.

meanings.definition: Engaging in aerial combat between military aircraft.
meanings.sent1: Pilots train hard to prepare for dogfighting in the sky.
meanings.sent2: During wartime, dogfighting plays a crucial role in air battles.
meanings.sent3: The movie depicted a thrilling dogfighting scene between fighter jets.
meanings.sent4: The intense dogfighting maneuvers of the fighter planes amazed the spectators.
meanings.sent5: The veteran pilot shared his experience of surviving a dogfighting encounter.
